description: This file is a C source file implementing functions for managing a linked list of pattern nodes used in telemetry data processing. It contains functions for inserting, searching, comparing, printing, and deleting pattern nodes, interfacing with GLib's GList.

methods.name: int insertPCNode(GList ** pch,char * pattern,char * header,DType_t dtype,int count,char * data,bool trim)
methods.description: Inserts a new pattern node at the beginning of the list, allocating memory for the node and duplicating provided strings.

methods.name: gint comparePattern(gconstpointer np,gconstpointer sp)
methods.description: Performs custom comparison between a node pattern and a search pattern, returning success if the pattern is found within the string.

methods.name: pcdata_t * searchPCNode(GList * pch,char * pattern)
methods.description: Searches for a node in the list matching the given pattern.

methods.name: void print_pc_node(gpointer data,gpointer user_data)
methods.description: Debug function to print details of a single pattern node.

methods.name: void printPCNodes(GList * pch)
methods.description: Iterates over the list and prints all pattern nodes.

methods.name: void freePCNode(gpointer node)
methods.description: Frees memory of a pattern node, including its strings.

methods.name: void clearPCNodes(GList ** pch)
methods.description: Frees all nodes in the list, effectively clearing it.

ctags.name: insertPCNode
ctags.pattern: /^int insertPCNode(GList **pch, char *pattern, char *header, DType_t dtype, int count, char *data,/
ctags.signature: (GList ** pch,char * pattern,char * header,DType_t dtype,int count,char * data,bool trim)
